init.description: Connect your BMS to Home Assistant. Currently only JBD BMS are supported!

serial_number.description: JBD BMS' come with a default serial number of 0. In order for Home Assistant to differentiate between multiple devices, a unique serial number must be assigned to the BMS. The BMS Tools integration will now generate a serial number and write it to the EEPROM of your BMS. This will not affect the operation of the BMS.
